name: Notion Ultimate Workout Planner
description: Transform Your Fitness Journey with the Ultimate Workout Planner & Tracker Notion Template!Achieve Your Fitness Goals, Stay Organized, and Keep Motivated with All-In-One Ultimate Workout Planner Notion Template.Revolutionize your fitness routine with our comprehensive Notion template designed to streamline every aspect of your wellness journey. Plan and track your workouts effortlessly, with dedicated sections for scheduling workouts, tracking your workout history by muscle groups, and creat
features: Workout Planner and Tracker; Workout history; Exercises Library; Muscle Groups; Create and Plan Workout Programs; Track Weight; Gym Membership manager; Workout Resource Library; Meal Planner, Recipes and Shopping List; Health, Nutrition & Medications Tracker
